title: What if I wanna play Yasuo but I hate CertainlyT,

replies.body: don't play yasuo, because 80% people do nothing but feed?

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2l7LKAlZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-04T01:11:23.669+0000)
>
> don't play yasuo, because 80% people do nothing but feed?

I'll try not to.......
Don't play Yasuo because he is overplayed :) give someone else some love :(

> [{quoted}](name=Gravelord,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2l7LKAlZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-03T20:25:45.107+0000)
>
> Don't play Yasuo because he is overplayed :) give someone else some love :(

Tbh I really like the concept of Control Fighters who fights with a focus on controlling the scene (a combo between fighting and manipulating). But I have pretty much been forced to play as support (who is all control) these days as most champs who have that theme are deemed simply unfair or OP by me.

However I personally do not find Yasuo that way even though I have a long standing history of CT hate, I had only found his passive shield to be broken but it has since been fixed, prompting me to try him out but it clashes with my principles (CertainlyT....).

No sure what to do.

I understand the hatred for CertainlyT. Seems like he just wants to make champs with everything in their kit haha. True damage, Mobility, Bleed, Poke, Invulnerability? Easy sorted brah, Nah man everyone plays Yasuo dude, Play someone that needs more skill, not a champ that needs one item to carry :p I never get mid or top so i never get to play a lot of good champs but when i do i try champs that aren't played all day every day :) Try Jayce man! He is fun, he also has fun mechanics!

> [{quoted}](name=Gravelord,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2l7LKAlZ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-04T09:33:32.001+0000)
>
> I understand the hatred for CertainlyT. Seems like he just wants to make champs with everything in their kit haha. True damage, Mobility, Bleed, Poke, Invulnerability? Easy sorted brah, 

Ikr.

>Nah man everyone plays Yasuo dude, Play someone that needs more skill, not a champ that needs one item to carry :p I never get mid or top so i never get to play a lot of good champs but when i do i try champs that aren't played all day every day :) 

That's true.

>Try Jayce man! He is fun, he also has fun mechanics!

I can have a look. Thx for the suggestion bud.
